name: Lost Pixels
description:
GGJ-2021

How to play?

First the desired item will appear as half, then with one mouse click we will select the other half correct items. We can move left and right with the a and d keys on the keyboard. After selecting the product, we come to the same location and give the product.

Programming by Batuhan ÖZALP

Designed by Kıvanç DEVECİ
